archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0395
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a BSS solution I must be able to remove any particular account, incl. options to keep attached connections (and move them elsewhere) or deactivate the attached connections at the same time.

properties.value: PIM: Which channels should support account removals(CRM, SC,EP)? OOTB - it can be supported by 2 separate processes: account termination process and subscription move process. Destination account for kept connections should be selected manually by the user? Employee with interest free leaves the company with the number - use case should be discussed.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
